subject: Re: Casey files,
author: jamietreetalker
full_text:
Hey, I was noticing that one-word-at-a-time thing the other day. I think
you're right. Some of them are way better at this than others. It very
well could be that the blabbery ones are the lower spirits (or what I
think of as the less enlightened ones). The lower ones tend to be
deceitful, too, and more malicious, kind of like they're bitter. I just
ignore them, mostly, but sometimes if they get to mouthy, I just turn it
off.  If the more enlightened ones have to work around the others, maybe
that just forces them to make their messages more clear.




--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> Thanks, but I just think Spirit are getting better with talking to us
then
> it use to be when we first started this, now I can even just talk with
one
> of  them, and they will skip through others with one word at a time
over the
> others  talking, which is really cool!  The ones in the lower plains
really
> do need  prayer and encouragement from us to keep them moving in that
> "long, line of  regrets" as David calls it.sf
>
>
> In a message dated 6/13/2011 1:24:56 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,
> thequilldriver@... writes:
>
>
>
>
>
> Those are nice recordings, Snow! I can hear most of them very 
clearly.
>
> Nice work!
>
> --- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) ,
> SnowfireL@ wrote:
> >
> > Well, I have some info from the peanut  gallery, most is high
pitched
> so
> > many of you guys won't understand  it, signing type angel files, I
> didn't want
> > to believe how a mother  could kill her own child, but it seems she
> did the
> > deed. Seems from  what the angels say, the grandma and mom Casey got
> into a
> > fight,  Casey was mad so when the parents were gone, she put the
baby
> into
> >  the truck, and closed the lid, she may have been tied so she 
couldn't
> get
> > out and or druged. In one of the files, you can hear  Caylee crying
> for her
> > mama, she stills asks for her mother, and the  angels are saying,
that
> > "Christ holds the baby" I have lots of files  now, there are but a
> few. I think
> > the spirit say, her mother will  "get life." sf
> >
>
